trans-unit.source: Self-study tutorial for users new to <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>

target.mrk: Self-study tutorial for users new to <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>

trans-unit.source: To help you get up and running with <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> as quickly as possible, this self-study guide highlights some of the more important features of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial uses a series of activities designed to demonstrate the use of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in the embedded and client/server configurations. After performing these activities, you will find <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> to be an easy-to-use and fully functional relational database management system (RDBMS).

seg-source.mrk: This tutorial uses a series of activities designed to demonstrate the use of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in the embedded and client/server configurations.
After performing these activities, you will find <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> to be an easy-to-use and fully functional relational database management system (RDBMS).

target.mrk: This tutorial uses a series of activities designed to demonstrate the use of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in the embedded and client/server configurations.
After performing these activities, you will find <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> to be an easy-to-use and fully functional relational database management system (RDBMS).

seg-source.mrk: Tutorial skills and software requirements

target.mrk: Tutorial skills and software requirements

trans-unit.source: To perform the tutorial activities, you do not need to have any prior knowledge of Java software, the Java Database Connectivity (JDBC) API, or SQL. Each activity provides the complete command syntax that you need to use for each operation. Instructions include the syntax for both a UNIX Korn shell and a Windows command prompt.

seg-source.mrk: To perform the tutorial activities, you do not need to have any prior knowledge of Java software, the Java Database Connectivity (JDBC) API, or SQL.
Each activity provides the complete command syntax that you need to use for each operation.
Instructions include the syntax for both a UNIX Korn shell and a Windows command prompt.

target.mrk: To perform the tutorial activities, you do not need to have any prior knowledge of Java software, the Java Database Connectivity (JDBC) API, or SQL.
Each activity provides the complete command syntax that you need to use for each operation.
Instructions include the syntax for both a UNIX Korn shell and a Windows command prompt.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial demonstrates, but does not teach, the Java, JDBC and SQL code that is presented. If you want a deeper understanding of these topics, you will need to consult additional reference materials.

seg-source.mrk: This tutorial demonstrates, but does not teach, the Java, JDBC and SQL code that is presented.

trans-unit.source: Problems and feedback on the tutorial activities

seg-source.mrk: Problems and feedback on the tutorial activities

target.mrk: Problems and feedback on the tutorial activities

trans-unit.source: If you experience problems with any aspect of the tutorial activities, send an e-mail message to <codeph>derby-user@db.apache.org</codeph>. Someone from the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> community will respond to your message.

Someone from the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> community will respond to your message.
